name: Beat Hacker
description:
Play songs from the popular Japan-based kawaii music duo Neko Hacker for FREE and to your heart's content!
Immerse yourself into each track as you tap, flick and strum your way towards a new high score!
Enjoy special voice clips from the talented vocalists Nanahira and Wotoha!
Complete in-game events to unlock bonus content such as exclusive songs!

* Note: The in-game user interface is currently only available in Japanese.

---

Neko Hacker was formed in 2018 by members of Field of Forest, Sera and Kassan. We have created a new genre called “Kawaii Future Rock” and our mission is to spread Japanese music all over the world.

Official Website
https://nekohacker.com/
